title: Anthropic's CEO says that in 3 to 6 months, AI will be writing 90% of the code software developers were in charge of
body: "And then in 12 months, we may be in a world where AI is writing essentially all of the code," Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said.

title: I thought coding was dead after Anthropic's CEO claimed that AI may take over within 12 months â€” I was wrong, and AI thinks so, too
body: Cursor AI refused to generate code for the racing game, recommending manual coding as the best option. It indicated AI-generated code robs users of the opportunity to learn, leading to an unhealthy dependency on AI tools.
